column5: 2015 at princeton health and rehab after a long illness. she was a retired teacher's aide. she is survived by two sons: steve sholar and wife

column14: patricia sholar. visitation will be from 4 to 8 pm friday at morgan's funeral home. funeral services will be held saturday 10:00 at morgan's funeral home. burial will follow in the cedar hill cemetery. read janice sholar's obituary and guestbook on morgansfuneralhome. com.
